data.eml:eml: Submarine cave hermit crabs (Crustacea: Decapoda: Anomura: Paguroidea) from three islands of the Ryukyu Islands, southwestern Japan

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Osawa, Masayuki, Fujita, Yoshihisa (2019): Submarine cave hermit crabs (Crustacea: Decapoda: Anomura: Paguroidea) from three islands of the Ryukyu Islands, southwestern Japan. Zootaxa 4560 (3): 463-482, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4560.3.3
